test.name: TC 1: Home page - Search a product and add most rated/free shipping product to the basket

kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

test.doc: This test case search the products in the Excel file, respectively, and add the most rated product from the free shipping ones to the basket.
